name: Dropping ball - Classic game
description:
In a boring life, give yourself some happy time!

This is a relaxing and enjoyable game, and the game operation is also very simple.

Game guide
-Tap the screen to drop the ball
-The ball will randomly roll to different slots and get different rewards
-Light up all slots and play the lucky wheel once
-The small rewards you get will bring you huge rewards

Sounds simple, doesn't it? But in fact, But it really depends on your luck and skills, let's try it!
